name: The Peg Nativity
description:
Each Peg Nativity is a unique, home-made model of the Christian nativity scene and includes 3 wise men (with 3 gifts), 3 shepherds (with sheep), the angel Gabriel, Mary and Joseph and baby Jesus in a manger. All characters are made from dolly pegs and come packaged in a box which expands into a stable, with a guiding star. 

At present, the Peg Nativities are made to order and so it may be up to a week after an order is placed before the nativity is dispatched.
